mapper.sql: id, user_id, user_name, sign_time, sign_place, sign_in, sign_out, ip
mapper.select: select class_user.member_id userId,course.class_id,course.id course_id,sign_place, MAX(case sign_in when 1 then sign_time else null end )signPreTime, MAX(case sign_in when 0 then sign_time else null end )signNextTime ,course.begin_time,course.end_time from course left join user_sign ON course.id = user_sign.course_id AND course.class_id = user_sign.class_id left join class_user on class_user.class_id=course.class_id where class_user.member_id=#{userId} and course.class_id=#{classId} and course.id=#{courseId} group by user_id,class_id,course_id,sign_place
